alert.note: Alert for Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 6:01PM MDT until June 21 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 601 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Thurman, or 20 miles north of Flagler, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Arickaree School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado.
